1.name: VPOUND
1.description: NORMAL-type attack Slightly stronger than TACKLE Many POKéMON know this move

2.name: KARATE CHOP
2.description: A FIGHTING-type attack Often turns into a critical hit and inflicts double the damage

3.name: DOUBLESLAP
3.description: Although each slap is weak, this attack hits the target two to five times in succession

4.name: COMET PUNCH
4.description: Although each slap is weak, this attack hits the target two to five times in succession

5.name: MEGA PUNCH
5.description: A NORMAL-type attack move It is highly accurate and relatively powerful

6.name: PAY DAY
6.description: A move that nets money at the end of battle How much depends on attack frequency and level
6.effect: Money is earned after the battle.

7.name: FIRE PUNCH
7.description: A special FIRE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of inflicting a burn on the target

8.name: ICE PUNCH
8.description: A special ICE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of freezing the target

9.name: THUNDERPUNCH
9.description: A special ELECTRIC-type attack Has a one-in-ten shot at paralyzing the target

10.name: SCRATCH
10.description: A NORMAL-type attack Sharp claws are used to inflict damage on the target

11.name: VICEGRIP
11.description: A NORMAL-type attack used only by POKéMON with pincers The target is gripped and injured

12.name: GUILLOTINE
12.description: A single-hit knockout attack Learned only by POKéMON that have large pincers

13.name: RAZOR WIND
13.description: A two-turn attack with the wind attack in the second turn Learned by many FLYING types
13.effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

14.name: SWORDS DANCE
14.description: A special move that boosts the user's ATTACK power Normally used up to three times

15.name: CUT
15.description: A NORMAL-type attack Also used for cutting small bushes to open new paths

16.name: GUST
16.description: A FLYING-type attack The bird POKéMON flaps its wings to create a powerful wind
16.effect: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce/Sky Drop with double power.

17.name: WING ATTACK
17.description: A FLYING-type attack The attacking  POKéMON spreads its wings and charges

18.name: WHIRLWIND
18.description: A powerful wind that blows the target away The opposing trainer must use a new POKéMON
18.effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

19.name: FLY
19.description: The POKéMON flies high, then strikes in the next turn Used to fly to places already visited
19.effect: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

20.name: BIND
20.description: Traps and squeezes the target over several turns The target cannot move while under attack
20.effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

21.name: SLAM
21.description: A NORMAL-type attack move The attacker uses an appendage to slam the target hard

22.name: VINE WHIP
22.description: A GRASS-type attack The POKéMON uses its cruel whips to strike the opponent

23.name: STOMP
23.description: A NORMAL-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of making the target flinch if it hits

24.name: DOUBLE KICK
24.description: A FIGHTING-type attack As the name implies, it is actually two quick kicks in succession

25.name: MEGA KICK
25.description: A NORMAL-type attack Out of all the POKéMON kicking attacks, this is the strongest

26.name: JUMP KICK
26.description: A forceful FIGHTING-type attack If it misses, however, the attacker gets hurt
26.effect: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

27.name: ROLLING KICK
27.description: A sharp FIGHTING-type attack Has a one-in-three shot at making the target flinch

28.name: SAND-ATTACK
28.description: An attack in which sand is used to blind the target and reduce its attack accuracy

29.name: HEADBUTT
29.description: A NORMAL-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of making the target flinch if it hits

30.name: HORN ATTACK
30.description: A NORMAL-type attack A sharp horn is driven hard into the target to inflict damage

31.name: FURY ATTACK
31.description: A NORMAL-type attack The POKéMON rapidly jabs at its opponent several times

32.name: HORN DRILL
32.description: A single-hit knockout attack Learned only by POKéMON with a horn or horns

33.name: TACKLE
33.description: A NORMAL-type attack Many POKéMON know this attack right from the start

34.name: BODY SLAM
34.description: A NORMAL-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of para- lyzing the target if it hits

35.name: WRAP
35.description: Traps and squeezes the target over two to five turns, making the target unable to move
35.effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

36.name: TAKE DOWN
36.description: A charging attack One quarter of the damage it inflicts comes back to hurt the attacker

37.name: THRASH
37.description: An attack that lasts two to three turns Afterwards, the attacker becomes confused
37.effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

38.name: DOUBLE-EDGE
38.description: A charging tackle attack One quarter of the damage comes back to hurt the attacker

39.name: TAIL WHIP
39.description: A move that lowers the target's DEFENSE Useful against tough, armored POKéMON

40.name: POISON STING
40.description: A POISON-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of leaving the target poisoned

41.name: TWINEEDLE
41.description: An attack that strikes twice The target may occasionally become poisoned
41.effect: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

42.name: PIN MISSILE
42.description: An attack that fires many  needle-like projectiles from the body Strikes several times

43.name: LEER
43.description: A move that lowers the target's DEFENSE Useful against tough, armored POKéMON

44.name: BITE
44.description: A bite made using sharp fangs This may cause the opponent to flinch, and it might not attack

45.name: GROWL
45.description: A move that lowers the target's ATTACK power Can normally be used up to six times

46.name: ROAR
46.description: A terrifying roar that drives the target away The opposing  trainer must use a new POKéMON
46.effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

47.name: SING
47.description: A special NORMAL-type move A soothing melody lulls the target to sleep

48.name: SUPERSONIC
48.description: A special NORMAL-type move Supersonic sound waves are used to confuse the target

49.name: SONICBOOM
49.description: A NORMAL-type attack It always inflicts a set amount of damage

50.name: DISABLE
50.description: A move that disables one of the target's moves That move can't be used until it wears off
50.effect: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

51.name: ACID
51.description: A POISON-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of lowering the target's DEFENSE

52.name: EMBER
52.description: A FIRE-type attack Has a one- in-ten chance of leaving the target with a damaging burn

53.name: FLAMETHROWER
53.description: A powerful FIRE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of leaving the target with a burn

54.name: MIST
54.description: Provides full protection against any enemy status attack
54.effect: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

55.name: WATER GUN
55.description: A WATER-type attack Stronger than BUBBLE Many WATER-type POKéMON learn this move

56.name: HYDRO PUMP
56.description: The strongest WATER-type attack While it is powerful, it may miss the target

57.name: SURF
57.description: A WATER-type attack This move is strong and highly accurate

58.name: ICE BEAM
58.description: An ICE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of freezing the target solid

59.name: BLIZZARD
59.description: The strongest ICE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of freezing the target

60.name: PSYBEAM
60.description: A PSYCHIC-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of making the target confused

61.name: BUBBLEBEAM
61.description: A WATER-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of reducing the target's SPEED

62.name: AURORA BEAM
62.description: An ICE-type attack Has a  one-in-ten chance of reducing the target's ATTACK power

63.name: HYPER BEAM
63.description: An extremely powerful attack The attacker becomes so tired, it has to rest the next turn

64.name: PECK
64.description: A standard FLYING-type attack It is favored by POKéMON with beaks or horns

65.name: DRILL PECK
65.description: A standard FLYING-type attack It is strong and highly likely to hit the target

66.name: SUBMISSION
66.description: Strongest FIGHTING attack One quarter of the damage also hurts the attacker

67.name: LOW KICK
67.description: A FIGHTING-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of making the target flinch if it hits
67.effect: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

68.name: COUNTER
68.description: A retaliation move that pays back double the damage of a physical attack Very accurate
68.effect: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

69.name: SEISMIC TOSS
69.description: A FIGHTING-type attack Throws the target with enough force to flip the world
69.effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

70.name: STRENGTH
70.description: A very powerful NORMAL-type attack Also used for moving obstacles like boulders

71.name: ABSORB
71.description: A GRASS-type attack It adds half the HP it drained from the target to the attacker's HP
71.effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

72.name: MEGA DRAIN
72.description: A GRASS-type attack It adds half the HP it drained from the target to the attacker's HP
72.effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

73.name: LEECH SEED
73.description: Plants a seed on the target POKéMON It slowly drains the target's HP for the attacker
73.effect: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

74.name: GROWTH
74.description: A NORMAL-type move that raises SPCLATK Normally used up to six times
74.effect: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

75.name: RAZOR LEAF
75.description: A GRASS-type attack that uses sharp-edged leaves Likely to get a critical hit

76.name: SOLARBEAM
76.description: Strongest GRASS-type attack Energy is absorbed in the first turn, then fired on the next
76.effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

77.name: POISONPOWDER
77.description: A move that poisons the target If poisoned, the victim loses HP steadily

78.name: STUN SPORE
78.description: Special move that causes para- lysis The victim has a one-in- four chance of immobility

79.name: SLEEP POWDER
79.description: Induces sleep A POKéMON will stay asleep for several turns if an item isn't used to wake it

80.name: PETAL DANCE
80.description: A dance-like attack that lasts two to three turns The attacker becomes confused
80.effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

81.name: STRING SHOT
81.description: Strings are sprayed out and wrapped around the target to reduce its SPEED

82.name: DRAGON RAGE
82.description: A DRAGON-type attack It always inflicts a set amount of damage

83.name: FIRE SPIN
83.description: A FIRE-type attack that lasts two to five turns The flames make the target unable to move
83.effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

84.name: THUNDERSHOCK
84.description: An ELECTRIC-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of paralyzing the target

85.name: THUNDERBOLT
85.description: An ELECTRIC-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of paralyzing the target

86.name: THUNDER WAVE
86.description: A special move that causes paralysis The victim has a one- in-four chance of immobility

87.name: THUNDER
87.description: Strongest of all ELECTRIC-type attacks Has a one-in-ten shot at paralyzing the target

88.name: ROCK THROW
88.description: A ROCK-type attack As the name implies, a huge boulder is dropped on the target

89.name: EARTHQUAKE
89.description: An attack that inflicts damage by shaking the ground Useless against the FLYING type
89.effect: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

90.name: FISSURE
90.description: Causes a single-hit knockout if it hits Useless against FLYING- type POKéMON

91.name: DIG
91.description: The attacker digs underground in the first turn, then pops up in the next turn to attack
91.effect: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

92.name: TOXIC
92.description: A move that badly poisons the target The amount of poison damage increases every turn

93.name: CONFUSION
93.description: A PSYCHIC-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of leaving the target confused

94.name: PSYCHIC
94.description: A PSYCHIC-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of lowering the target's SPCLDEF rating

95.name: HYPNOSIS
95.description: A special PSYCHIC-type move The target is hypnotized into a deep sleep

96.name: MEDITATE
96.description: A special move that boosts the user's ATTACK power Can normally be used up to six times

97.name: AGILITY
97.description: A special move that greatly boosts the user's SPEED Normally used up to three times

98.name: QUICK ATTACK
98.description: Always strikes first If both POKéMON use this, the one with higher SPEED attacks first

99.name: RAGE
99.description: A non-stop attack move The user's ATTACK power increases every time it sustains damage

100.name: TELEPORT
100.description: A special move for instantly escaping from wild POKéMON Useful in the wild only
100.effect: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

101.name: NIGHT SHADE
101.description: A GHOST-type attack Highly accurate, it always inflicts damage
101.effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

102.name: MIMIC
102.description: A move for learning one of the opponent's moves, for use during that battle only

103.name: SCREECH
103.description: A move that makes a horrible noise It sharply reduces the target's DEFENSE

104.name: DOUBLE TEAM
104.description: Creates illusionary copies of the user They disorient the enemy, reducing its accuracy

105.name: RECOVER
105.description: Half of the user's maximum HP is restored Few POKéMON learn this move on their own
105.effect: User recovers half its max HP.

106.name: HARDEN
106.description: Raises the user's DEFENSE Useful when battling physically strong POKéMON

107.name: MINIMIZE
107.description: Reduces the user's size and makes it harder to hit Can normally be used up to six times

108.name: SMOKESCREEN
108.description: Creates an obscuring cloud of smoke that reduces the enemy's accuracy

109.name: CONFUSE RAY
109.description: A sinister flash of light makes the target confused A special GHOST-type move

110.name: WITHDRAW
110.description: Used mainly by POKéMON with shells By withdrawing into the shell, DEFENSE is increased

111.name: DEFENSE CURL
111.description: Raises the user's DEFENSE Can normally be used up to six times in a row

112.name: BARRIER
112.description: Instantly forms a barrier between the user and the opponent DEFENSE is increased

113.name: LIGHT SCREEN
113.description: Reduces damage from special attacks by about half A special PSYCHIC-type move
113.effect: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

114.name: HAZE
114.description: Eliminates all changes affecting stats, such as SPEED, of both POKéMON in battle

115.name: REFLECT
115.description: Reduces damage from physical attacks by about half A special PSYCHIC-type move
115.effect: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

116.name: FOCUS ENERGY
116.description: Raises the likelihood of nailing the opponent's weak spot for a critical hit

117.name: BIDE
117.description: The user waits for several turns At the end, it returns double the damage it received
117.effect: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

118.name: METRONOME
118.description: The user waggles its finger, triggering a move There is no telling what will happen
118.effect: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

119.name: MIRROR MOVE
119.description: A move that strikes back with the opponent's last move It comes after the enemy's move
119.effect: User performs the opponent's last move.

120.name: SELFDESTRUCT
120.description: The user explodes, damaging the enemy, then faints Useless against the GHOST type

121.name: EGG BOMB
121.description: A NORMAL-type attack An egg is launched at the target It may miss, however

122.name: LICK
122.description: A GHOST-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of leaving the target with paralysis

123.name: SMOG
123.description: Smog is spewed as a cloud Has a fifty-fifty chance of poisoning the target

124.name: SLUDGE
124.description: A POISON-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of poisoning the target

125.name: BONE CLUB
125.description: A physical attack using a bone as a club If it connects, it may cause the target to flinch

126.name: FIRE BLAST
126.description: Strongest FIRE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of inflicting a burn on the target

127.name: WATERFALL
127.description: A WATER-type attack Hits with a blow packing the power of fish traveling up waterfalls

128.name: CLAMP
128.description: Grips the target in the attacker's shell for two to five turns
128.effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

129.name: SWIFT
129.description: A NORMAL-type attack It is highly accurate, so it can be counted on to inflict damage

130.name: SKULL BASH
130.description: In the first turn, the attacker tucks its head The next turn, it head-butts at full steam
130.effect: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

131.name: SPIKE CANNON
131.description: A physical attack consisting of two to five consecutive hits Highly accurate

132.name: CONSTRICT
132.description: A NORMAL-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of reducing the target's SPEED
132.effect: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

133.name: AMNESIA
133.description: A move that increases the user's SPCLDEF stat It is normally used up to three times

134.name: KINESIS
134.description: A special move of bending spoons to confound the enemy Makes the user harder to hit

135.name: SOFTBOILED
135.description: Half of the user's maximum HP is restored May also be used in the field
135.effect: User recovers half its max HP.

136.name: HI JUMP KICK
136.description: Stronger than JUMP KICK If it misses, the attacker takes 1/8 the damage it would've caused
136.effect: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

137.name: GLARE
137.description: Transfixes the enemy with terrifying sharp eyes,  frightening it into paralysis

138.name: DREAM EATER
138.description: Works only on sleeping POKéMON Steals the target's HP and adds 50%% of it to the user's HP
138.effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

139.name: POISON GAS
139.description: A poisonous cloud of gas is forcefully expelled to poison the target

140.name: BARRAGE
140.description: Several spheres are thrown consecutively at the target to inflict damage

141.name: LEECH LIFE
141.description: An HP-draining attack It adds half the HP it drained from  the target to the attacker's HP
141.effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

142.name: LOVELY KISS
142.description: A special move that puts the target to sleep with a big kiss (Actually, the victim faints)

143.name: SKY ATTACK
143.description: Strongest FLYING-type attack Stores energy in the first turn, then fires in the next
143.effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching. High critical hit ratio.

144.name: TRANSFORM
144.description: Transforms user into a copy of the target, including the type All moves have only five PP each
144.effect: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

145.name: BUBBLE
145.description: A WATER-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of reducing the target's SPEED

146.name: DIZZY PUNCH
146.description: A NORMAL-type attack Has a  one-in-five chance of leaving the target confused

147.name: SPORE
147.description: Special spores are scattered from mushrooms If the foe inhales them, it will fall asleep

148.name: FLASH
148.description: Blinds the target with a bright flash of light, reducing the  opponent's accuracy

149.name: PSYWAVE
149.description: A PSYCHIC-type attack of varying intensity It occasion- ally inflicts heavy damage

150.name: SPLASH
150.description: A move that involves only flopping and SPLASHing around It has no effect

151.name: ACID ARMOR
151.description: Melts the user's body for protection A move that sharply raises DEFENSE

152.name: CRABHAMMER
152.description: A move that is used only by POKéMON with pincers Likely to get a critical hit

153.name: EXPLOSION
153.description: The most powerful attack of all However, the attacker faints after using this move

154.name: FURY SWIPES
154.description: The target is scratched by sharp claws two to five times in quick succession

155.name: BONEMERANG
155.description: A boomerang made of bone is thrown to inflict damage twice, on the way out and on return

156.name: REST
156.description: The user takes a nap to fully restore its HP and recover from any status abnormalities
156.effect: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

157.name: ROCK SLIDE
157.description: A ROCK-type attack that hits the target with an avalanche of rocks and boulders

158.name: HYPER FANG
158.description: A NORMAL-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of making the target flinch

159.name: SHARPEN
159.description: Raises the user's ATTACK power The edges of the POKéMON are made harder for more impact

160.name: CONVERSION
160.description: A special move that switches the user's elemental type into  one of the user's attack types
160.effect: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

161.name: TRI ATTACK
161.description: A NORMAL-type attack A triangular field of energy is created and launched
161.effect: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

162.name: SUPER FANG
162.description: If it hits, this attack cuts the target's HP in half Learned by POKéMON with developed fangs
162.effect: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

163.name: SLASH
163.description: A NORMAL-type attack It has a high probability of a critical hit for inflicting double damage

164.name: SUBSTITUTE
164.description: Uses 1/4 of the user's maximum HP to create a substitute that takes the opponent's attacks
164.effect: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

165.name: STRUGGLE
165.description: Used only if the user is totally out of PP The user is hit with 1/4 the damage it inflicts
165.effect: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

166.name: SKETCH
166.description: A move that allows the user to copy a move used by an opponent and learn that move
166.effect: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

167.name: TRIPLE KICK
167.description: A three-kick attack that inflicts increasing damage When one kick misses, the move ends
167.effect: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

168.name: THIEF
168.description: A DARK-type attack The attacking POKéMON may steal an item held by the target

169.name: SPIDER WEB
169.description: Sticky strings that prevent the target from escaping until the attacking POKéMON is gone

170.name: MIND READER
170.description: It predicts the opponent's movement The user's next attack will never miss
170.effect: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

171.name: NIGHTMARE
171.description: A move that makes a sleeping target have bad dreams The victim will steadily lose HP
171.effect: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

172.name: FLAME WHEEL
172.description: A FIRE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of inflicting a burn on the target

173.name: SNORE
173.description: Has a one-in-three chance of making the target flinch Can be used only by a sleeping POKéMON
173.effect: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

174.name: CURSE
174.description: Raises ATTACK and DEFENSE at the expense of SPEED It works differently for the GHOST type
174.effect: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

175.name: FLAIL
175.description: An attack that increases in power if the user's HP is low It could turn the tide in battle
175.effect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

176.name: CONVERSION 2
176.description: A move that changes the user's type into one that is resistant to the opponent's last move
176.effect: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

177.name: AEROBLAST
177.description: A powerful FLYING-type attack It often becomes a critical hit

178.name: COTTON SPORE
178.description: Spores that cling to the target, sharply reducing the opponent's SPEED

179.name: REVERSAL
179.description: An attack that increases in power if the user's HP is low It could turn the tide in battle
179.effect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

180.name: SPITE
180.description: A vengeful move that slightly reduces the PP of the opponent's last move
180.effect: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

181.name: POWDER SNOW
181.description: An ICE-type attack Has a one-in-ten chance of freezing the target

182.name: PROTECT
182.description: Completely foils an opponent's attack If used consecutively, its success rate decreases
182.effect: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

183.name: MACH PUNCH
183.description: An incredibly fast punch that always lands first

184.name: SCARY FACE
184.description: A horrific look that scares the victim, sharply reducing the target's SPEED

185.name: FAINT ATTACK
185.description: A DARK-type attack The move catches the opponent off guard, so it never misses

186.name: SWEET KISS
186.description: A sweet little kiss that causes the target to become giddy and confused

187.name: BELLY DRUM
187.description: A move that allows the user to consume half of its own HP in order to maximize its ATTACK
187.effect: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

188.name: SLUDGE BOMB
188.description: A POISON-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of leaving the target poisoned

189.name: MUD-SLAP
189.description: An attack that fires dirt, inflicting damage and reducing the target's accuracy

190.name: OCTAZOOKA
190.description: An attack that shoots ink Has a fifty-fifty chance of reduc- ing the target's accuracy

191.name: SPIKES
191.description: An attack that scatters SPIKES and injures opponent POKéMON when they switch

192.name: ZAP CANNON
192.description: An ELECTRIC-type attack Inaccurate but is guaranteed to cause paralysis if it hits

193.name: FORESIGHT
193.description: Neutralizes the foe's evasive- ness Also makes the GHOST type vulnerable to physical attacks
193.effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks to hit Ghosts.

194.name: DESTINY BOND
194.description: A move that causes the opponent to faint if the user faints after using this move
194.effect: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

195.name: PERISH SONG
195.description: A malevolent melody that causes both the user and the opponent to faint in three turns
195.effect: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

196.name: ICY WIND
196.description: An ICE-type attack It is guaranteed to reduce the target's SPEED if it hits

197.name: DETECT
197.description: Allows user to completely evade attack If used consecutively, its success rate decreases
197.effect: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

198.name: BONE RUSH
198.description: A GROUND-type attack The attacker uses a bone to club the foe two to five times

199.name: LOCK-ON
199.description: An attack that locks on to the target to ensure that the next attack will hit without fail
199.effect: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

200.name: OUTRAGE
200.description: An attack that lasts two to three turns Afterwards, the attacker will become confused
200.effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

201.name: SANDSTORM
201.description: An attack that creates a sand- storm The effect causes damage to both combatants

202.name: GIGA DRAIN
202.description: Half of the HP drained from the target is added to the attacker's HP
202.effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

203.name: ENDURE
203.description: Always leaves the user with at least one HP Success rate decreases if used repeatedly
203.effect: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used repeatedly.

204.name: CHARM
204.description: A move that charms the target into complacency, sharply reducing its ATTACK power

205.name: ROLLOUT
205.description: Attacks for five turns, growing more powerful each time Power returns to normal if it misses
205.effect: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

206.name: FALSE SWIPE
206.description: A move that adjusts ATTACK so that the foe has one HP left  Can't cause the foe to faint
206.effect: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

207.name: SWAGGER
207.description: A move that infuriates and  confuses the opponent, but it increases the target's ATTACK
207.effect: Confuses opponent, but sharply raises its Attack.

208.name: MILK DRINK
208.description: A move that restores HP by half of the user's max HP This move may also be used in the field
208.effect: User recovers half its max HP.

209.name: SPARK
209.description: An ELECTRIC-type attack Has a one-in-three chance of para- lyzing the target

210.name: FURY CUTTER
210.description: A BUG-type attack that grows more powerful with every hit Returns to normal if it misses

211.name: STEEL WING
211.description: Strikes the target with stiff wings Has a one-in-ten chance of raising the user's DEFENSE

212.name: MEAN LOOK
212.description: A probing stare that prevents the target from escaping until the attacking POKéMON is gone

213.name: ATTRACT
213.description: Infatuates targets, making it hard for them to attack foes of the opposite gender
213.effect: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

214.name: SLEEP TALK
214.description: Randomly chooses one of the user's moves Can be used only by a sleeping POKéMON
214.effect: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

215.name: HEAL BELL
215.description: The soothing ringing of a bell that eliminates all status problems for the entire party
215.effect: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

216.name: RETURN
216.description: A NORMAL-type attack The tamer the user, the more powerful the move

217.name: PRESENT
217.description: A move that inflicts major damage but may restore the target's HP

218.name: FRUSTRATION
218.description: A NORMAL-type attack The more the user dislikes its trainer, the more powerful the move

219.name: SAFEGUARD
219.description: A mystic power that protects the user from status problems for five turns
219.effect: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

220.name: PAIN SPLIT
220.description: A move that adds the HPs of the user and the target, then divides the total between them
220.effect: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

221.name: SACRED FIRE
221.description: A FIRE-type attack Has a one- in-two chance of leaving the target with a burn

222.name: MAGNITUDE
222.description: A GROUND-type attack The power of the attack will vary each time it is used

223.name: DYNAMICPUNCH
223.description: A FIGHTING-type attack In- accurate but guaranteed to confuse the opponent if it hits

224.name: MEGAHORN
224.description: A BUG-type attack that uses a stiff horn or horns It is rarely learned

225.name: DRAGONBREATH
225.description: A DRAGON-type attack Has a  one-in-three chance of paralyzing the target

226.name: BATON PASS
226.description: A move that transfers the user's status changes to the next POKéMON when switching
226.effect: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

227.name: ENCORE
227.description: Forces the target to continue to use the move it used last for the next two to six turns
227.effect: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

228.name: PURSUIT
228.description: A DARK-type attack It inflicts major damage if the target switches out in the same turn
228.effect: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

229.name: RAPID SPIN
229.description: A NORMAL-type attack By spin- ning quickly, the user can escape from restraining moves
229.effect: Raises user's Speed and removes entry hazards and trap move effects.

230.name: SWEET SCENT
230.description: A pleasant aroma that distracts the target, making the opponent easier to hit

231.name: IRON TAIL
231.description: Strikes the target with a stiff tail Has a one-in-three shot at lowering the target's DEFENSE

232.name: METAL CLAW
232.description: Strikes the target with sharp claws Has a one-in-ten shot at raising the user's ATTACK

233.name: VITAL THROW
233.description: A FIGHTING-type attack Always comes after the target's attack but never misses
233.effect: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

234.name: MORNING SUN
234.description: Allows HP to be restored by the morning sunlight In battle, half the user's max HP is restored
234.effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

235.name: SYNTHESIS
235.description: Allows HP to be restored by the sunlight In battle, half the user's max HP is restored
235.effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

236.name: MOONLIGHT
236.description: Allows HP to be restored by the moonlight In battle, half the user's max HP is restored
236.effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

237.name: HIDDEN POWER
237.description: A peculiar move that changes type and power depending on the POKéMON using it
237.effect: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

238.name: CROSS CHOP
238.description: A FIGHTING-type attack It is powerful and often lands a critical hit

239.name: TWISTER
239.description: A DRAGON-type attack Has a  one-in-five chance of causing the target to flinch
239.effect: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

240.name: RAIN DANCE
240.description: Summons rain for five turns While it is raining, the power of WATER-type moves increases

241.name: SUNNY DAY
241.description: Makes the weather sunny for five turns When sunny, FIRE- type moves are more powerful

242.name: CRUNCH
242.description: A DARK-type attack Has a one-in-five chance of reducing the target's SPCLDEF

243.name: MIRROR COAT
243.description: The foe will receive double the damage the user sustained from a special attack High accuracy
243.effect: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

244.name: PSYCH UP
244.description: Self-hypnosis move that copies the foe's stats changes, then applies them to the user

245.name: EXTREMESPEED
245.description: An attack that always strikes first It can be learned by only a few POKéMON

246.name: ANCIENTPOWER
246.description: A ROCK-type attack This prehistoric move may boost all of the user's stats
246.effect: May raise all user's stats at once.

247.name: SHADOW BALL
247.description: A GHOST-type attack Has a  one-in-five chance of reducing the target's SPCLDEF

248.name: FUTURE SIGHT
248.description: A special PSYCHIC-type attack It strikes the target two turns after it is used

249.name: ROCK SMASH
249.description: A FIGHTING-type attack In the field, it can be used to shatter rocks to open new paths

250.name: WHIRLPOOL
250.description: Lasts two to five turns Foe becomes trapped in a vortex, making it impossible to switch
250.effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

251.name: BEAT UP
251.description: A DARK-type attack The user's fellow party POKéMON appear to pummel the target
251.effect: Each Pokémon in user's party attacks.
